/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. In the distance, buildings rise, their architecture hinting at the blend of traditional and modern styles that are characteristic of Beijing. The image is a beautiful representation of the city's vibrant life and rich cultural heritage.
